name: LickyGiraffe's D&D Store
shortDescription: A multitude of Digital D&D Goods
about:
I've been a Dungeon Master for a few years now, starting in 4th Edition before coming to 5th Edition. This store will offer up a variety of different items designed to assist/inspire my fellow DMs! For now I'll keep it simple but may expand to include the following items based on demand!

- Monster/NPC Stat Blocks

- Magic Items

- Standalone Encounters

- Maps I've created (built using Hexographer)

- Writeups of Adventures I've run


I'm also happy to consider custom requests!


Content will be delivered by messaging of a link

All donations welcome - bitcoincash:qz6sjlnl9z0lxdkzau8027ahtzt95sglfuyvlj05a5

My content is licensed using the MIT License so use/modify it any way you want but please do not claim that you made it yourself, thanks!

name: Crypto Greeting Cards
shortDescription: Uniquely Themed Greeting Cards with Built-In Cryptocurrency Wallet
about:
After being tired of the stacks of mundane, generic store-brand greeting cards, we set out to pair our passion in cryptocurrency with designs inspired by the community. Each card features a pre-generated cryptocurrency wallet that can be transferred to the recipient. Like cash in an envelope, only better. The goal is to inspire new participants to join the financial revolution!

Crypto Greeting Cards are an affordable way to introduce friends, family, and loved ones to cryptocurrency. After redeeming the card, the recipient will learn:

  1. how to setup a wallet app
  2. the difference between public address and private key
  3. an introduction to transactions (sweeping funds)

Is there any better way to spread cryptocurrency than kind words and a small gift?


Security

We take extensive precautions to ensure the security of the cryptocurrency wallet in each card. The printing and assembly is processed in-house. We do not store any copies of the private keys. We recommend small value transfers ($20-100) intended for gift exchange. Please inform the recipient to sweep the balance at his/her earliest convenience. Do not use for long-term cold storage.

Our pre-generated cards are aimed to provide accessibility to individuals of all skill levels. For the true cypherpunk experience, consider generating your own keys with our DIY cards.


Instructions

Visit: https://www.cryptogreetings.com/pages/instructions

name: Crypto Republic
shortDescription: Online Shopping. Selling high-quality and diverse crypto merchandise, and more! Crypto Stickers, t-shirts, bitcoin phone wallpapers, & game keys.
about:
We Believe in: A FREE Marketplace, Blockchain Technologies & Crypto Currencies.   

    Crypto Republic is an online store specialized in selling high-quality and diverse crypto currency merchandise. 

Physical products: 

               • Unique tshirts variety in stylist designs for bitcoin, ether, bitcoin mario, monopoly man, and more great apparel. 

               • Crypto stickers for bitcoin, monero, zcash, and dogecoin. 

               • Crypto Drawstring bags or also known as gym bags.

               • Bitcoin Beanies are warm and good for any occasion. 

Digital products: 

               • Game Keys for steam. Origin, xbox one and ps4 game keys coming soon. 


  • If you want a product available in Crypto Republic or any comments suggestions or questions, don't hesitate to send us a message!

 • You can reach us through OB chat, keybase.io, twitter or email to cryptorepublicstore@protonmail.com 

                                       Announcements & Promotions


LABOR DAY SALE 3$ OFF TSHIRTS, PLZ REQUEST THE ONE YOU LIKE TO ADJUST THE PRICE.

+ Store Reopens May purchase freely. Maintanance off. 

+ DO NOT PURCHASE ANY APPERAL(Except Tshirts, all tshirts are purchasable), GYM BAGS, BACKPACKS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE. 

Tshirts are the exception, and are good to buy. :D

+ We are Rebranding from btcemporium to Crypto Republic.

Request game if not listed.

                                Company Core values and Inception:                  

Why did you choose CRYPTO REPUBLIC as the name for your store?

We felt we needed a name to show the crypto community and blockchain developers/supporters such as others and ourselves; we choose Crypto. While selecting Republic as a huge store that offers a variety of goods. Therefore, we placed those together and Crypto Republic was born. We have a positive outlook that we can evolve into a better store and promote the OB community here and everywhere :) Our previous brand name was BTC Emporium but we came up with a new, new catchy name that includes more of the community and its Crypto Republic. We hope you love it!

                  Mission Statement: A community wearing their beliefs, crypto fans, enthusiasts, curious people about tech with potential wearing nice shirts that idea that we can create a better future with blockchain tech and creative (life changing) ideas and projects. Cause HELL YEAH!! WE ARE PROUD OF USING BITCOIN, LITCOIN, ZCASH, MONERO, BITCOIN CASH AND MORE!!! POWER TO THE CRYPTO XD

                Our Goal: We strive to consistently exceed customers expectation by providing exceptional quality, responsiveness and customer service. We are human though, every day trying to improve our business and ourselves. Let know how we can do better. Our priority is to help to help the cryptocurrency and blockchain community spread the word about the new disruptive technologies which are already changing the world. 

                                  Charity Projects:

  Our Commitment: We're committed to give away $5 every month to Open Bazaar Store until November 2017, regardless of profit or sales. (Not been able to donate due to exuberant bitcoin miners fees and not altcoin alternative payment). Campaign discontinued.

+October2017Transaction: b7b2ec7613328d5dc1c1c4a1d98c7280f690ab8f9450fe9e42a68cd7af28797507

+November2017Transaction: 0c37878e4bd032de88ce9095d57b88724c1afcfc9754c53479f4a476087b

+50% of the proceeds of the sale of ebooks on our Openbazaar site Go to Charity 🎁 or worthy causes & announced 📣 on our OB Home page and twitter near or at the end of each month, we will include polls 🎲 to choose, anyone can participate in choosing where the funds go. 🖇️ Campaign discontinued.

January's 2018 of $3 BCH sales proceeds goes to archive.org (By the website: The Internet Archive is 501(c)(3) non-profit, is building a digital library of Internet sites and other cultural artifacts in digital form. Like a paper library, we give free access to researchers, historians, scholars, the print disabled, and the public.)Visit for Transaction Proof Campaign Discontinued

TERMS OF USE AND PRIVACY

Trademarks & Copyright ©: All content included within this Store, such as text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital download, data compilations and software, is the property of the Store Owner or its content suppliers. Any use or reproduction is prohibited without prior written permission. Your privacy is important to us, and will only use information collected on buyers when needed. 

WARNING: 

*** Be careful! Choose reputable vendors/moderators and ask others of their interaction or check if they are legitimate. OB1 came out with verified moderators whose identities are known by team. They are accountable, and would be wise to choose a verified moderator for any merchant, or new ones. 

 For more info read: https://www.openbazaar.org/scam-prevention/

 • Crypto Republic does not endorse the sites followed by Crypto Republic.
